fullDescription: Dance Brigade builds community and promotes social justice by creating and presenting contemporary dance, by conducting year-round dance classes serving over 1,000 adults/week and by organizing Grrrl Brigade, a performance andÂ leadership development program serving low-to moderate income girls agedÂ 13 to 18. Dance Brigade's programs engage culturally diverse communities and artists in the exploration of contemporary social issues and cultural identities through dance. Grrrl Brigade empowers yo
whatTheyOffer: Dance Mission connects and empowers diverse Bay Area communities and artists through all aspects of dance and dance theater, including the production of new works, instruction, and performance. They are an artist-driven, feminist organization dedicated to building community, addressing social justice issues, exploring cultural identities, promoting inclusivity, and creating a more peaceful world through collective action.
